testEntries.test: SA LEGAL VALIDATORS — FORENSIC VALIDATION [TC-001] should validate correct SA ID number
SA LEGAL VALIDATORS — FORENSIC VALIDATION [TC-002] should reject invalid SA ID numbers
SA LEGAL VALIDATORS — FORENSIC VALIDATION [TC-003] should validate correct business registration numbers
SA LEGAL VALIDATORS — FORENSIC VALIDATION [TC-004] should validate business registrations with branch numbers
SA LEGAL VALIDATORS — FORENSIC VALIDATION [TC-005] should reject invalid business registrations
SA LEGAL VALIDATORS — FORENSIC VALIDATION [TC-006] should handle edge cases gracefully
